Uses of Interface
org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.charts.coloring.Colorer

  • Packages that use Colorer 
    Package Description
    org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.datasource
    Package containing classes that implements access to ARFF files for visualisation purposes.
    org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.datasource.single
    Package containing classes that implement access to one dataset and one triplet in each step.
    org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.charts
    This package contains classes, that implement the functionality to display scatter plots for input datasets.
    org.pikater.web.visualisation.implementation.charts.coloring
    Package containing classes implementing functions, that computes the color of the points drawn in charts.
